Sentencas: To significantly increase the amount of exsolved particles, the complete phase reconstruction from simple perovskite to Ruddlesden-Popper (R-P) perovskite is greatly desirable.
Titulo: Unveiling the key factor for the phase reconstruction and exsolved metallic particle distribution in perovskites

Sentencas: However, a comprehensive understanding of key parameters affecting the phase reconstruction to R-P perovskite is still unexplored.
Titulo: Unveiling the key factor for the phase reconstruction and exsolved metallic particle distribution in perovskites

Sentencas: Herein, we propose the Gibbs free energy for oxygen vacancy formation in Pr-0.5(Ba/Sr)(0.5)TO3-delta (T = Mn, Fe, Co, and Ni) as the important factor in determining the type of phase reconstruction.
Titulo: Unveiling the key factor for the phase reconstruction and exsolved metallic particle distribution in perovskites

Sentencas: Furthermore, using in-situ temperature & environment-controlled X-ray diffraction measurements, we report the phase diagram and optimum 'x' range required for the complete phase reconstruction to R-P perovskite in Pr0.5Ba0.5-xSrxFeO3-delta system.
Titulo: Unveiling the key factor for the phase reconstruction and exsolved metallic particle distribution in perovskites

Sentencas: Among the Pr0.5Ba0.5-xSrxFeO3-delta, (Pr0.5Ba0.2Sr0.3)(2)FeO4+delta - Fe metal demonstrates the smallest size of exsolved Fe metal particles when the phase reconstruction occurs under reducing condition.
Titulo: Unveiling the key factor for the phase reconstruction and exsolved metallic particle distribution in perovskites

Sentencas: The exsolved nano-Fe metal particles exhibit high particle density and are well-distributed on the perovskite surface, showing great catalytic activity in fuel cell and syngas production.
Titulo: Unveiling the key factor for the phase reconstruction and exsolved metallic particle distribution in perovskites

Sentencas: The complete phase reconstruction to Ruddlesden-Popper perovskite is greatly desirable to increase the exsolved particle distribution.
Titulo: Unveiling the key factor for the phase reconstruction and exsolved metallic particle distribution in perovskites

Sentencas: Here, the authors report a key factor for the complete phase reconstruction in perovskites, leading to good catalytic activity in fuel cell and syngas production.
Titulo: Unveiling the key factor for the phase reconstruction and exsolved metallic particle distribution in perovskites
